price: Na bͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn abodin, na fa wo ho ma no kora-kora-kora.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
